title: Lagertha, the Paladin
mainText: Whenever you or anything you own would be affected by a negative effect, you may discard Lagertha from your hand or town: Negate that effect.
flavourText: ...not just any Paladin! I am of the order of the Dwarven Grace! Not a single elf could compare to the glory of the Dwarven Grace. Everything else is hearsay.
